Flood Survival Guide
Be prepared, stay safe, and recover effectively during floods with these essential tips and techniques.
1. Prepare Before the Flood
• Stock up on food and water.\n• Keep emergency kits ready.\n• Know your local evacuation routes.
Image for preparing before the flood
2. Stay Safe During the Flood
• Avoid walking or driving through floodwaters.\n• Move to higher ground immediately.\n• Follow instructions from local authorities.
Image for staying safe during the flood
3. Recover After the Flood
• Check your home for structural damage.\n• Clean and disinfect to prevent disease.\n• Seek assistance if needed.
Image for recovering after the flood

Earthquake Survival Guide
Learn how to prepare, stay safe, and recover effectively during earthquakes.
1. Prepare Before the Earthquake
• Identify safe spots in your home.\n• Secure heavy furniture and appliances.\n• Keep emergency supplies ready.
Image for preparing before the earthquake
2. Stay Safe During the Earthquake
• Drop, cover, and hold on under sturdy furniture.\n• Stay away from windows and heavy objects.\n• Avoid using elevators.
Image for staying safe during the earthquake
3. Recover After the Earthquake
• Check for gas leaks and structural damage.\n• Stay away from damaged buildings.\n• Seek medical help if injured.
Image for recovering after the earthquake
